sources.title: Make Mine a Double
sources.description: Title: Make Mine a Double Summary: A WWII British secret agent has a desperate mission in occupied France. An airman who is his double is enlisted in the scheme with the intention of confusing the enemy, but everyone gets confused. Directed by: Darcy Conyers Actors: Brian Rix, Cecil Parker, William Hartnell Production Company: Sydney Box Associates Release Date: 1961 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When German rockets start to land on England the Prime Minister insists there is only one man for the job - Wing Commander Blenkinsop. A daring masterplan is hatched to send a double of the Wing Commander to Egypt while he secretly flies to France. The fate of the project, indeed of Britain, depends on the double - Aircraftsman Arthur Atwood, presently on latrine duties somewhere in England.

metadata.Plot: When German rockets start to land on England the Prime Minister insists there is only one man for the job - Wing Commander Blenkinsop.
